body:
It's fine for both bots to run as gopherbot. Gopherbot also pushes from
Gerrit to Github and that's a separate program too. It's unclear to me that
the programs need to be merged. There is almost no overlap in what they do
and it would be easier to update them individually than as one
mega-program. Given that I think cmd/gopherbot doesn't make much sense.
There are many things that act as gopherbot.
